body: im speechless ... that twisted turn of events ... so "happy" family .. so the real question is who's to blamed at this point
Can someone translate it please
Damn that’s pretty wicked…(wicked is good

The basic summary of the story was that she is his daughter.

And used him to get revenge on her mother who hired men to rape her to pull off a PR stunt that made her mother's company really successful.

She sets up her dad to rape her mom because she thinks the man that her mom hates the most is her dad.

In the end (from my understanding) she wanted to continue her relationship with her dad but her father can't accept the fact that she is his daughter (because he's really in love with her) and no longer wants her in his life.

She attacks him with a knife which make him lose his memories. (Super cliche...)

And they pretend to be a happy family until he sees the picture on his phone which (I'm assuming) triggers him to regain his memories.
There's an alternate ending to this where the mom finds her daughter after a few years. Daughter is with her dad and they already have a baby.

Finally, the description in the cartoon is that the man woke up and thought it was all a dream, but then the mobile wallpaper he saw revealed everything.
Maybe the man have never experienced anything of his dream in reality, but they are undoubtedly an incestuous family.
The daughter is pregnant with her father's child.

The man and the woman had broken up before,but the woman insisted on giving birth to the man's daughter, and the daughter actually was the girl.
So when the man has sex with the girl, he doesn't know the girl's identity. The girl is the biological daughter of the man and the woman.

Then the daughter came in and started fisting her mother for "stealing her man". The mother reveals that the girl was actually the man's daughter and when the daughter started to have sex with the man, the woman tried to replace and "save" her daughter which the man complied and went at it. Then the daughter went full yandere mode and we get a time skip. They are now a "normal" family and the daughter still "loves" her Daddy VERY much...

So from what I gathered, The mother and man were once married/in a relationship but broke up and the man is confronting the woman about something(Probably about money but not sure because I can only read a limited amount of Chinese). The young girl later went to the man and gave the money to him but one thing led to another and they started a sexual relationship. They started falling for each other and soon the mother confronted the man about this but fainted when she confirmed that they were indeed in a sexual relationship which led to the rape while asleep as he still held feelings for her.
